getPrice: select * from [dbo].[productsPrice] where ItemCode=@ItemCode and Pricelist=@Pricelist
getInfo: select t1.ItemCode, t1.ItemName,  t2.Pricelist, t2.price,t1.tipo,t1.cbod  FROM products t1 inner join productsPrice t2 on t1.ItemCode = t2.ItemCode where t1.ItemCode=@ItemCode and t2.Pricelist=@Pricelist
getInfo2: select t1.ItemCode, t1.ItemName,  t2.Pricelist, t2.price,t1.tipo  FROM products t1 inner join productsPrice t2 on t1.ItemCode = t2.ItemCode where t1.ItemCode=@ItemCode
getInfoComp: select t1.ItemCode, t1.ItemName,t1.tipo  FROM products t1  where t1.ItemCode=@ItemCode
getExistencia: select t1.ItemCode, t1.ItemName,  t2.cbod, t2.stock,t2.minimo, t2.maximo, t2.comprometido, t2.solicitado FROM products t1 inner join  existencias t2 on t1.ItemCode = t2.ItemCode where t1.ItemCode=@ItemCode and t2.cbod=@cbod
